zombie.name: Jennifer
zombie.backstory: Former ER nurse for 18 years. Started having debilitating fatigue at 43. Gained 40 pounds. Brain fog so bad I forgot my kids' names. Doctors said 'it's just stress' and 'you're getting older.' I spent 3 years crying myself to sleep thinking something was seriously wrong with me.
zombie.dramaticMoment: The breaking point was when I collapsed at work and they still found 'nothing wrong.' I finally found a functional medicine practitioner who actually LISTENED. Within 4 months, my energy came back. I lost the weight. I got my LIFE back. That's when I knew - I have to help other women avoid what I went through. ðŸ˜­
zombie.transformation: From exhausted, overweight, depressed nurse questioning my sanity â†’ To certified health coach making $4,200/month helping women with the SAME symptoms doctors dismissed.
zombie.incomeStory: $4,200/month working 12 hours/week. Started with $0 and no business experience. First client was my neighbor. Now have a waitlist.

zombie.videoTestimonialScript: Hi, I'm Jennifer. Three years ago, I was a burnt-out nurse who couldn't get out of bed. Doctors told me nothing was wrong. I gained 40 pounds. I forgot my own kids' names from the brain fog. [PAUSE - emotional] I thought I was losing my mind. When I finally found functional medicine, everything changed. Now I help other women avoid what I went through. Last month I made $4,200 working part-time. If you're watching this and feeling stuck... I was you. And if I can do this, you absolutely can too.
